menu.title: BBQs
menu.description: There are lots of options to celebrate or to help express your appreciation for staff, tenants or clients.

menu.title: Beverages & Bar Service
menu.description: We've got beverages hot and cold. Our certified bartenders are experienced professionals who posses premium service skills.

menu.title: Buffets
menu.description: Choose from a variety of hot food options. Select one of our popular pre-set menus or create your own from our distinctive courses.

menu.title: Canapés, Stations & Platters
menu.description: There is a wide selection to create either a full meal or a light cocktail reception. Clients rave about our pleasently polite and professional service staff.

menu.title: Celebrations of Life & Memorials
menu.description: For your convenience, we have highlighted our most popular combinations. You may want to select one of them and personalize it our create your own from our á la carte items.

menu.title: Desserts
menu.description: Our selection of tasty á la carte items, dessert buffets, and build-your-own stations are perfect for every occasion.

content.span: We care for the clients we serve
content.text: Our goal as a trusted Metro vancouver catering is to help make your meeting or event the best it can be.

content.span: We care for the enviroment we live in
content.text: With that in view, earth stewardship affects the daily choices and decisions we make.

content.span: We care for the team we work with
content.text: With this in mind, we're committed to an environment where all our staff can develop and flourish.
ingredients, proven recipes and professional staff are what go into our food.
Therefore, everything we do, from recipe design to shopping, preparation, cooking, presentation and serving is done with catering in mind.
Our food will always meet or exceed your expectations.
with kitchens in Vancouver and Surrey and a fleet of delivery vehicles, we’ll get the yum to your meeting or event anywhere from West Vancouver to Abbotsford.
you're on a tight schedule and we are too — yours.
the right temperature and texture, looking good, tasting great and delivered with a smile.

testimonials.content: I just wanted to say thank you for the wonderful food and service you provided for our event. The food was delicious and the service was excellent. I received many compliments on the food and the service. I will definitely recommend you to others and will use your services again in the future. Thank you again for helping to make our event a success.
